name: 嚴堯瀚
objective:
本課程之目標在於介紹行動裝置遊戲設計實務所需了解之專業知識與技術，並透過專題設計的操作使學生能具備行動裝置遊戲設計的實務能力。課程內容包含行動遊戲個案研究與市場分析、行動遊戲設計企劃、行動遊戲軟體設計應用、遊戲風格設計等。教學將以課堂講授、設計專案執行等方式進行，並以專題報告繳交以及專題設計作品發表為評量依據。
This course is focused on introducing the knowledge and techniques of mobile game design practice, accompanying with project design to allow students to be equipped with the capability of mobile game design practice. Course contents include mobile game case study and market analysis, mobile game design planning, software and game programming, game styling design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing and conducting design project. Students will be evaluated by project reports, design work and presentation.
